item.title: YOUR PLASTIC BAG IS SO YESTERDAY - Environmental Activism
item.description: Plastic bags are one of the main causes of marine pollution. Plastic doesn't biodegrade and stays in the ocean forever. Plastic waste is everywhere. Make a statement and say no to plastic bags. A simple design for people who care about their environment

item.title: PLANT POWERED Gorilla Cool Design for Vegans & Vegetarians
item.description: A cool negative space design showing the drawing of a gorilla head and the words PLANT POWERED. Great for people who live a vegan or vegetarian lifestyle. Make a statement and show that you are powered by plants, love animals and repsect their lives.

item.title: How to Escape Colons in CSS Classes in JavaScript
item.description: Learn how to select HTML elements with special CSS classes like 'empty:hidden' using JavaScript's document.querySelectorAll method.

item.title: Python's Global Interpreter Lock (GIL): Understanding the Pros and Cons
item.description: Discover the pros and cons of Python's Global Interpreter Lock (GIL). Understand how to optimize performance and concurrency for your Python applications.
